channel.title: [VB][Source] My Send Keys Method
channel.description:
Ive been using this method for ages now and i havent been banned yet so i guess its undetectable What it basically does is type each letter for you with a random wait inbetween each letter.
[code]Private Sub Command1_Click() Typekeys texttoautotype.Text SendKeys "{ENTER}" End Sub [/code]
[code]Public Function Typekeys(textstr As String) strText = textstr ReDim strData(Len(strText) - 1) As String For intX = 1 To Len(strText) strData(intX - 1) = Mid(strText, intX, 1) Next For x = 0 To UBound(strData) SendKeys strData(x) Wait (Int(Rnd * 100)) // The wait time to wait inbetween each keypress Next x End Function[/code]

item.title: [VB][Source] My Send Keys Method

item.title: [VB][Source] My Send Keys Method
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

Ive been using this method for ages now and i havent been banned yet so i guess its undetectable
What it basically does is type each letter for you with a random wait inbetween each letter.

Private Sub Command1_Click()
Typekeys texttoautotype.Text
SendKeys "{ENTER}"
End Sub

Public Function Typekeys(textstr As String)
strText = textstr
ReDim strData(Len(strText) - 1) As String
For intX = 1 To Len(strText)
   strData(intX - 1) = Mid(strText, intX, 1)
Next
For x = 0 To UBound(strData)
SendKeys strData(x)
Wait (Int(Rnd * 100)) // The wait time to wait inbetween each keypress
Next x
End Function

Read full topic
